Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Good skating on Hawks, Coyote and Cedar Trace.  Hawks has  a little scrub sticking up.  But the best it has been so far.   All freshly groomed. No tracks.Thank guys.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of snow ! Yesterday’s big groomer provided a firm flat skate deck . Today nature provided about 2 inches of fluff . Has to push a little bit , but it was very nice - and the sun came out . LF 7

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning tomorrow! Thanks to the Snow Farmers we will open tomorrow with all of our Front Side and South Side runs. This will bring our run count to over 30 runs, and Pintail Peak will open by Friday, December 19. This is our earliest full opening in over a decade. The lifts will spin daily from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. with night skiing starting on December 26. Grab your gear and your friends and head to Nub's Nob to enjoy some incredible early season skiing.
